error.message: Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\simpletest\UserCreationTrait in class Drupal\Tests\entity_reference_override\Kernel\FormatterTest. Deprecated in drupal:8.4.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\Tests\user\Traits\UserCreationTrait instead.
Call to deprecated function entity_get_display(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use EntityDisplayRepositoryInterface::getViewDisplay() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to entity_reference_override.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
